about_the_game:
CoS - Rise of Baybars is a captivating single-player, story-driven adventure RPG that takes you on an epic journey through the rich history of the 13th-century Middle East. Step into the shoes of Baybars I, a young Kipchak Turk enslaved and sold into the Mamluk military, who rises to become one of the most revered sultans of Egypt.

Key Features:

Authentic Historical Setting: Immerse yourself in meticulously researched environments, from the bustling streets of Cairo to the majestic landscapes of the Levant, with accurate depictions of historical events, architecture, and cultural nuances.
Compelling Narrative: Experience a gripping story that follows Baybars' transformation from a slave to a powerful leader, filled with strategic battles, political intrigue, and personal growth.
Strategic Combat and Leadership: Engage in tactical combat that requires careful planning and execution, reflecting Baybars' renowned military prowess. Make critical decisions that shape the course of your journey and the fate of the region.
Educational and Cultural Insight: Learn about the rich history and culture of the Middle East through interactive storytelling, in-game lore, and a dedicated storyteller NPC who narrates tales of poets and warriors.
Dynamic World: Explore a living, evolving world that responds to your actions and decisions, with changing political landscapes, new alliances, and emerging threats.
Customization and Personalization: Tailor Baybars' appearance, equipment, and abilities to suit your playstyle. Develop and manage your own settlements, reflecting your growing influence and leadership.
Rich Visual and Audio Design: Enjoy stunning visuals and an authentic Middle Eastern soundtrack that bring the 13th-century world to life.
Join Baybars on his epic journey, make history, and leave a lasting legacy in CoS - Rise of Baybars. Available now on PC and Console.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 580 (8 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
